title: Breakfast Burritos
steps: Put the hashbrowns and bacon in the oven and turn it on to 400Â°F. Cook for 20 minutes, then flip.
Continue cooking for another 10 - 20 minutes, until bacon is crispy and hashbrowns are golden brown.
Scramble the eggs in a skillet, season with salt and pepper.
Toast each of the tortillas over an open flame on the stove, or in a dry skillet.
Assemble the burritos with eggs, hashbrowns, bacon, and cheese. Wrap tightly and serve with salsa.
